src.storage.model package¶

Submodules¶

src.storage.model.PathData module¶

Module used for internal representations of path in common format. Functions for hash and equality are override for future extension of PathData class that should not influence the values mentioned above.

class src.storage.model.PathData.PathData(path_data: tuple, is_file: bool = True, modif_data: float = None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used for applying continuously syncing between 2 locations

Attributes¶

path_datatuple

Path of the file/folder split, so it can be kept in a common format for all type of locations (not including separator)

is_filebool

Path corresponds to a file or not (default True)

modif_datafloat

Time in seconds from epoch representing modification date of the file (default None for folders)

Module contents¶

Package that stores internal representations of different files and folders, including relevant data, such as flags to determine whether a path is a file or not. Functions for debugging purposes and equality of paths are also implemented here, all in PathData class
